title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 712 - Standards Of Construction For General Hospital Facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 712 - Standards Of Construction For General Hospital Facilities

State Regulations

Subpart 712-1 - Standards For General Hospital Construction Projects Approved Or Completed Prior To October 14, 1998 (§ 712-1.1 to 712-1.28)

Subpart 712-2 - Standards For General Hospital Construction Projects Approved Or Completed On Or After October 14, 1998 (§ 712-2.1 to 712-2.5)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 712

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§2802, 2803

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
